name: Aquaseal Flexible Durable Repair Adhesive .75oz
description: A clear urethane rubber sealant for repairing neoprene wetsuits and sprayskirts, drysuits, and other watersports gear. Apply Aquaseal® as a liquid, and it dries to form a flexible, watertight seal. Use a single thick application when repairing thicker items. You can also use it to repair tents, garments or dry bags if you don't have any seam sealant handy.Adheres to neoprene, nylon, vinyl, canvas GORE-TEX® fabrics and rubber.8–12 hour cure time.Dries clear.21g (0.75oz.).
